column1: Love this product. Has helped reduce fine lines on my face. Smooth soothing texture!
Absolutely wonderful I have dry sensitive skin and I've only used 2 days and I can see and feel a difference thank you so much. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This is a great hyalauronic product that doesn't drip everywhere, it thins out once on skin and doesn't sting while using in conjunction with pure retin A.
Awesome moisture.. Can't go wrong.use it everyday for at least a week and hated running out... [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Wonderful product for the cost!! I believe anyone that gives this a try will enjoy it thoroughly! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love Olay products and admittedly at times try other more expensive ones when I fall for the adds or the commercials, but I always come back to Olay and now I've learned to stay with them. This product is wonderful and has truly made my skin look healthier and younger. At 61 I truly appreciate that! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product works wonders on my wrinkles. I have used Olay face lotions since I was in my teens and now that I'm older I need it more than ever. Olay lotions have always been light and not left my skin feeling sticky or heavy and this gel is the same. I love that I have seen my wrinkles disappear. Thank you Olay for helping me defy my age! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like how this gel feels really soft and cool on my skin. It absorbs quickly and cleanly, and my face feels softer afterwards. It has some very key ingredients and I found the price to be right. Do all these anti-age creams work? Well, sure, my skin is more moisturized and soft and it seems like fine lines are reduced. Am I ever going to have my 20 year old skin again? Probably not. but at least I'm doing what I can and trying to be realistic.

I like olay regenerist sculpting serum more. I like the feel and the smell of it. I have been using it for 6 years. My skin looks and feels soft and smooth and healthy. It helps keep my 64 years a secret!!
Thank you [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used this product for several weeks and have found that it is no better or worse than anything else I have tried. I have seen no difference between this product and several other face creams I have used in the last decade in the effect it has on my skin. It IS moisturizing but quite overpriced, considering it does not make me look any younger, as it is supposed to do (I am 58 yrs old). [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product, It provides 24 hours of intense, age defying hydration for my aging dry skin. This is a lightweight product that feels really good on my skin. This facial cream keeps my skin hydrated and looking good through out the day. If you have dry aging skin I highly recommend this product for you. I'm sure you will be pleased. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product feels great going on and absorbs quickly leaving no residue. That said, after speaking with an Olay representative on the phone, I believe I will stick with the Regenerist Microsculpting cream (has vitamin E which this product does not) as my primary moisturizer. Suggestion was made to use it before applying the microsculpting cream which I have been doing and may continue if I see a difference with the addition. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The first thing I noticed when I opened the container was that the product was of a liquid consistency. it was off-putting and difficult to apply, but I gave it a shot. I didn't like the feel, it was not like a serum, it was like water.It didn't do anything for my skin. I am very disappointed I didn't enjoy this product, and that is didn't do anything for my skin, except dry it out. Once it dried on my face it was flaky. Maybe I received a defective produst. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like this product so far. I haven't used it long enough yet to be able to comment on its effectiveness, but I love how it feels on my face. It is very lightweight and absorbs right into my face. I love Olay products . Once I finish this jar I will compare the results to the Olay Regenerist Micro-sculpting cream that I usually use, and then decide which to use. I definitely recommend Olay! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product helps my skin from being too dry. It also helps my skin feel smoother and refresh. I usually have oily skin, and most moisturizer runs my make up off, but I used this instead and my make up been in place and so I love it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I didn't notice much of a smell different from other Olay creams.

It was very smooth but a little bit goes a long way, in other words it is almost runny compared to night cream and total effects. I still would recommend it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is easily and quickly absorbed into the skin and is very moisturizing. I love the smell - it is fresh and clean without being overly scented. I also love the feel of this Olay product. It feels smooth, silky and feels so nice when applying it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been an Olay girl since high school. Started with the pink stuff and have never been disappointed with any product I have used. This new cream is very hydrating for my dry skin. I will purchase again ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried this first on my summer hands and could certainly really see a huge difference in the hydration of my skin. When used at night I could see and feel that my skin was softer and more supple in the morning. it is slightly tacky and hard to apply foundation over, so would recommend using at night. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was a bit skeptical because at first site it looks and feels thin. Most moisturizing products are thick,heavy. I was pleasantly surprised to find how effective this ADVANCED product has been. I love the OLAY products and this one will be a keeper! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Still using this product so I can't give it 5 stars on effectiveness and value. But I can tell you that it is very light on the skin, not at all greasy, and has a pleasant smell (wish was a little lighter on the scent). I still have a lot left in the jar because you really don't need to use a lot, so it is lasting a long time. But I have noticed my skin a lot softer. So far I am liking this a lot. I will be finishing the jar and so far I would recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Olay has been a trusted brand name in my household for years (and my Mom's!) because they are a leader in the market place and are truely committed to testing and developing products that bring the best to us. This product is no exception. It has made my skin more supple, hydrated and has a certain glow. At my age, this is difficult to achieve, but with Olay it has happened. I will look into your other products in the Olay Age Defying ADVANCED collection. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is great because it is thick, silky, and smooth as it is applied to my face. It absorbs quickly and leaves no residue or sticky feel to it as it instantly dries. I can apply my Olay CC cream right away for a fresh weekend look without a lot of effort. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product feels so light on your skin not the least bit sticky compared to other gels I've tried. I do like that it keeps my skin feeling soft and moisturized throughout the day but can't say I've noticed a glow. For the price point it's definitely worth the money and will probably continue using during the day but not ready to leave my Olay regenerist behind. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Glides on smoothly. Good moisturizer, stays on all day. It feels light, not greasy. It is in a handy jar rather than a tube. Because it is a gel cream it will apply easily. Does not clog pores. It works well in hot humid weather condiions. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I personally noticed a difference in my skin overnight.

I also put it on my chest below my neck. Felt soothing as soon as it touches your skin. I presently use Olay Regenerist micro sculpting cream. I love that too! However, Hydrating Gel cream moisturizer has a different feel. Like moisturizing with a cool cream. Very hydrating, indeed. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Will continue to use in am & pm and in between times.
This has become my favorite drug store gel mousturizer. It's light, refreshing, great for my oily skin AND wears well under makeup!

Bought this after loving the spf 15 in this new line. Moisturizing, soothing and non irritating. Makes pores look smaller and skin look younger. Perfect moisture balance and great addition to Olay lines. Skin is glowing! Thank you Olay!

It's my new go to daily moisturizer! This product feels great on my skin and absorbs quickly. It doesn't leave you feeling sticky, just moisturized. It also has a wonderful fragrance! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I love the light fresh smell and leaves skin soft and supple. Will f\definitely make this a part of my daily routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
My facial skin glows with a dewy aura when I apply this product. My wrinkles relax and my skin is so smooth. Twice a day is perfect. I love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is a good value because it is very reasonably priced and delivers great results. My skin feels and looks smoother after only a few weeks of use. Excellent product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using ProX, but I really like this product as well. I continue to use the ProX line,but now I supplement with this lovely moisture rich cream. Thank you Olay for another great product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer has a silky, non-greasy feel at a much lower cost than high-priced facial moisturizers. It sinks in quickly too. I definitely recommend giving it a try. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like that this cream is nice and light and absorbs quickly. Light creams tend not to hydrate your skin as well but this one does. Very happy with it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

it helps start your routine when there's a nice scent for your beauty routine your skin feels great feel after applying and continues through out the day [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

the only negative is no spf other than that the product is perfect . I enjoy the feel and the look it gives me. another excellent product from Olay!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I liked Olay age defying Advanced gel. It went on very light. Not greasy. The gel texture seemed to soak into the skin quickly. It is great for summer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

At the age of skin changes, from dryness, texture and wrinkles, I found this to be a nice cream for smoother results. The hydration factor was excellent! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like this gel. It seems to disappear quicker and feel less "masklike" than lotions. I love that it is oil-free! Will never go back to a lotion after trying this product! Thank you! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Only need to use a little. Hydrates the skin. Love this! It will be a staple in my skincare routine. And you can't beat the price. Quality product and I have tried them all! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Instant moisture and softness and a little goes a long way. It's does hydrate my face really well.. I loved it. Great for summer. Thanks [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Feels great on your skin! Absorbs completely and doesn't leave your skin feeling greasy! Doesn't irritate my sensitive skin either!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Love this product! Feels cool going on, and quickly sinks into the skin. Makes my face feel extremely hydrated. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

very light weight - feels cool on face and no sticky feeling - skin glows a little and feels fresh - I am a longtime user and fan of olay products - [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product is very nice. A little goes a long way and has a nice scent. Does brighten up my skin and moisturizes well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product moisturizes without getting sticky or tacky. It's really good for T-zone conditions. I recommend this. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
The product smells great. It takes a little while to soak in so it's great for night time moisturizing. It does make skin look plumped up. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It smooth it not greasy feeling abosorbs quickly. It smells nice. I would recommend it to others .It would be better if it was less expensive in the store [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product is one of the best things I hat I have tryed [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Thank you for making this ! My wrinkles was starting to get bad then I tried this and I really can see the difference
deep action to the skin leaving it feel completely new [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I could see a difference on my skin after just one week. A great skin cream at a great price ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Product feels sticky, not absorbed by skin. I am not impressed with results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
It makes my skin look and feel soft and silky without a heavy cream cover. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Very light and silky. Love it!! Definitely my favorite Olay product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product feels wonderful on my skin. Very light, non greasy, and just a hint of fragrance. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product will never reveal your true age! It is easy to apply. Worth every penny. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
The smell just makes you feel good. This product makes your skin feel fresh and clean [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product smells amazing, & is smooth on your face. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Love the smell and love the feel of the lotion. Not greasy and glides on but not thick. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
My skin feels hydrated all day! I am glowing all day. It's perfect! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
The product feels great on my skin. It's very light and smooth. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Exactly what I expected from an Olay product. My skin loved it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Maybe I haven't use this product long enough but I see no different [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product smells amazing due to the light fresh scent. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product feels amazing and smells great. I can't believe it doesn't cost a lot more! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This product feels amazing and smells great. I can't believe it doesn't cost a lot more! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
